page.title: 04Traffic in Mumbles
page.content: Mumbles Rd. is one of the busiest roads in Swansea.They have built a new roundabout at the junction of Mumbles Rd. and Newton Rd.They put it there last year because the traffic was so heavy,and there were so many accidents.They have a shortage of car parks as well,so many people wanted to build one where the bus terminus is.Mumbles roads are very narrow because they were built for the village,not for the tourists.The road space is reduced when cars park on either side of the road.People often park on the yellow lines.In summer you have to get to the beaches at 9.30 or 10.00 because the car parks get full very quickly.Off season the hotels,car parks and guest houses are empty. By Benjamin Keith.
